page.title: 20CONCLUSION-SOUTH SELSEY
page.content: Only two of the 8,9 and 10 year old children who investigated and recorded our information live in our area. The elderly predominate, living on their own,or in Rest and Nursing homes. Several of the school parents work as staff or as building employees converting larger houses into Homes. Others find seasonal work in Broadreeds Holiday camp; some collect shellfish,which are sold widely.The sea defences have altered the nature of the coast,and the land has now been almost fully developed for houses mostly privately owned but with some new council bungalows.Even the few shops are becoming homes. Selsey's business area is in the north part. We thank all who helped, especially classes 4 and 5, their parents, teachers, Mrs. Hickman and all who live and work in Selsey.
